<script type="application/ld+json" id="json-ld">{
    "@context": "http://schema.org",

										<ul class="nav-menu nav-mobile-content nav-secondary-menu nav-menu-subscribe active"><li class="nav-menu-item nav-item active has-children" data-id="1"><a href="https://subscribe.hearstmags.com/subscribe/splits/seventeen/svn_sub_nav_link">Subscribe</a>
<ul class='nav-submenu' data-parent-id='1'>
<li class="nav-item"><a href="https://subscribe.hearstmags.com/subscribe/splits/seventeen/svn_gift_nav_link">Give a Gift</a></li>
<li class="nav-item"><a href="https://subscribe.hearstmags.com/subscribe/splits/seventeen/svn_digital_nav_link">Digital Editions</a></li>
</ul>
</li></ul>

										<ul class="nav-menu nav-secondary-menu nav-menu-social active">
						<li class="nav-menu-item nav-item active">
							<span class="nav-menu-link">Follow</span>

	data-tracking-id="share-button-facebook" title="Share on Facebook"
>

<header class="content-header listicle-header">
	
	
	<div class="content-header-inner">
		<h1 class="content-hed listicle-hed">Every Model Confirmed to Walk in the 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show</h1>

					<h2 class="content-dek listicle-dek"><p>Your complete guide to the new angels. </p></h2>
			</div>
</header>



<div class="content-container listicle-container">
	<div class="listicle-body">
		





	<div class="content-lede-image listicle-lede-image">
		<div class="content-lede-image-wrap">
			
					
		
	<img class="zoomable lazyload lazyload-in-view"
							src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7"
		
				data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/mac.h-cdn.co/assets/17/34/4000x2007/1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg?resize=768:*"

							
																															
			data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/mac.h-cdn.co/assets/17/34/4000x2007/1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg?resize=768:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/mac.h-cdn.co/assets/17/34/4000x2007/1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg?resize=768:* 650w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/mac.h-cdn.co/assets/17/34/4000x2007/1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg?resize=980:* 768w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/mac.h-cdn.co/assets/17/34/4000x2007/1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg?resize=980:* 980w"
		
				title=""
		alt=""
	/>

		
							
			
	
					</div>

									<div class="social-button-group lede-image-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-content-lede-image">
	<div class="social-button social-button-pinterest content-lede-image-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest" title="Share on Pinterest"
>
	
	<a class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.seventeen.com%2Ffashion%2Ftrends%2Fg12063225%2Fvictorias-secret-fashion-show-model-lineup-2017%2F&amp;description=Here%27s%20Every%20Model%20That%27ll%20Walk%20in%20the%202017%20Victoria%27s%20Secret%20Fashion%20Show%20And%20I%20Can%27t%20Wait&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fmac.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2F17%2F34%2F4000x2007%2F1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>


		


<div class="content-info listicle-info">
	<div class="content-info-inner">
		<div class="content-info-metadata">
										


	<div class="byline-with-image content-info-byline-with-image" data-tracking-id="recirc-byline" data-tracking-label="Chrissy Rutherford">
		<div class="content-info-byline-image">
							
					
		
	<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view"
							src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7"
		
				data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/rover/profile_photos/6596416d-7fe0-4447-a1bb-29857d998209.jpg?fill=1:1&amp;resize=200:*"

				
				title=""
		alt=""
	/>

		
					</div>

				<!-- shared/byline -->

	
	<div class="byline content-info-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">By
					<a href="/author/1644/chrissy-rutherford/" class="byline-name" rel="author" itemprop="name">Chrissy Rutherford</a>		
	</div>
<!-- / shared/byline -->

	</div>

			
										<div class="content-info-date js-date" data-publish-date="2017-08-23T21:21:00Z" data-format="MMM D, YYYY">
					Aug 23, 2017
				</div>
					</div>

				<div class="content-info-social-buttons primary-social-buttons listicle-social-buttons">
						<div class="aggregate-count content-info-aggregate-count">
	<span class="aggregate-count-number " data-social-providers="facebook twitter email"></span>
</div>


			<div class="social-button-group content-info-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-primary">
	<div class="social-button social-button-facebook content-info-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-facebook" title="Share on Facebook"
>
	<a class="social-button-link" href="//facebook.com/v2.10/dialog/feed?display=popup&amp;link=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.seventeen.com%2Ffashion%2Ftrends%2Fg12063225%2Fvictorias-secret-fashion-show-model-lineup-2017%2F&amp;redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.seventeen.com%2Ffashion%2Ftrends%2Fg12063225%2Fvictorias-secret-fashion-show-model-lineup-2017%2F&amp;name=Here%27s%20Every%20Model%20That%27ll%20Walk%20in%20the%202017%20Victoria%27s%20Secret%20Fashion%20Show%20And%20I%20Can%27t%20Wait&amp;description=Your%20complete%20guide%20to%20the%20new%20angels.&amp;picture=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fmac.h-cdn.co%2Fassets%2F17%2F34%2F4000x2007%2F1503519498-gettyimages-626899320-1503510054.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A&amp;app_id=112965278727107" target="_blank" data-social-key="facebook">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-facebook"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>
<div class="social-button social-button-twitter content-info-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-twitter" title="Share on Twitter"
>
	<a class="social-button-link" href="//www.twitter.com/share?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.seventeen.com%2Ffashion%2Ftrends%2Fg12063225%2Fvictorias-secret-fashion-show-model-lineup-2017%2F&amp;text=Here%27s%20Every%20Model%20That%27ll%20Walk%20in%20the%202017%20Victoria%27s%20Secret%20Fashion%20Show%20And%20I%20Can%27t%20Wait&amp;via=seventeen" target="_blank" data-social-key="twitter">

			</a>
</div>
<div class="social-button social-button-email content-info-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-email" title="Email"
>
	<a class="social-button-link" href="mailto:?body=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.seventeen.com%2Ffashion%2Ftrends%2Fg12063225%2Fvictorias-secret-fashion-show-model-lineup-2017%2F&amp;subject=Here%27s%20Every%20Model%20That%27ll%20Walk%20in%20the%202017%20Victoria%27s%20Secret%20Fashion%20Show%20And%20I%20Can%27t%20Wait" target="_self" data-social-key="email">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-email"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

		</div>
	</div>
</div>


		<div class="listicle-intro"><p>Your guide to the models confirmed for this year's lingerie extravaganza.</p></div>

		<div class="breaker-ad mobile-breaker-ad listicle-breaker-ad listicle-mobile-breaker-ad">
	<div class="breaker-ad-text">Advertisement - Continue Reading Below</div>
	<div id="gpt-ad-vertical-top-mobile" class="ad-container"></div>
</div>


		<div class="listicle-body-content">
							

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Nadine Leopold</span>
	</div>

		<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		
	
<div class="slide-media lazyload-in-view listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-embed slide-media-instagram">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
		<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50.0% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BYJYAVVnmGy/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">I can&#39;t even describe how I feel right now. I will never forget the first time I got a call from Victoria&#39;s Secret. I started from the bottom and had so many ups and downs but now I can say that if you work hard and believe in yourself and stay true to yourself the sky is the limit! I learned so much and I am so grateful. NEVER GIVE UP ON YOUR DREAMS  I am so excited to let you know that I will be walking in this years VSFS 🤗  I also want to thank EVERYONE who believed in me and pushed me and supported me along this amazing journey! If it wasn&#39;t for all you I would not be where I am right now. I am the happiest girl right now 😭🤗 thank you from the bottom of my heart for this opportunity @ed_razek  @monica.mitro @johndavidpfeiffer @10magazine 🙌🏻🤗😍 i am beyond grateful ❤️</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A post shared by Nadine Leopold (@nadineleopold) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2017-08-23T18:32:38+00:00">Aug 23, 2017 at 11:32am PDT</time></p></div></blockquote>
<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>
	</div>
</div>


			</div>

	<div class="listicle-slide-dek"></div>
</div>


	
			<div class="breaker-ad listicle-slide-list-ad">
	<div class="breaker-ad-text">Advertisement - Continue Reading Below</div>
	<div id="ad-article-breaker-leaderboard-0" class="ad-container"></div>
</div>

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Leomie Anderson</span>
	</div>

		<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		
	
<div class="slide-media lazyload-in-view listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-embed slide-media-instagram">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
		<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50.0% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BYJZ5tJhZEc/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">Words can&#39;t describe how excited and thankful I am to announce that I will a part of the @victoriassecret Fashion Show this year!!!! I want to say thank you to everyone who helped me achieve my dreams for a third year in a row and send my love and congrats to all my beautiful friends who will also be doing the show- the cast is crazy!!! Can&#39;t wait to make you all proud ❤</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A post shared by Leomie Anderson (@leomieanderson) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2017-08-23T18:49:12+00:00">Aug 23, 2017 at 11:49am PDT</time></p></div></blockquote>

	<div class="slide-media-inner">

	<div class="listicle-slide-dek"></div>
</div>

	</div>

	<div class="slide-media-inner">

		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Georgia Fowler</span>
	</div>

		<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">

	<div class="slide-media-inner">
		<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:62.4537037037037% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BYJK9qMHC-g/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">With all things celestial this week ...I can say, I am truly over the moon to be confirmed in the #VSFashionShow! ⚡️🌚⭐️🌒💫Huge shout out to @ed_razek @johndavidpfeiffer @monica.mitro @10magazine for giving me this magnificent opportunity!</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A post shared by GEORGIA FOWLER (@georgiafowler) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2017-08-23T16:38:40+00:00">Aug 23, 2017 at 9:38am PDT</time></p></div></blockquote>

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Blanca Padilla</span>
	</div>

		<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		
	
<div class="slide-media lazyload-in-view listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-embed slide-media-instagram">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
		<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50.0% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BYJKZhKFf8q/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">It takes a while to understand what a great key failure is. And once you get that, everything becomes more beautiful in any area of your life. I have a LONG way of learning! But I just wanted this process to be part of who I really am, so I set that goal. I worked not only my body but my mind to live the previous days and the casting day itself with a different perspective. Had up and downs on nerve wrecking (of course), but I allowed myself to feel the real excitement it brings and a lot less insecurities. It wasn&#39;t that easy cause I&#39;m emotional and when you walk in there your whole perfect plan kind of falls apart! I remember my legs shaking while walking in my first VS casting. But I wanted to leave that room knowing that I gave all I could and I would be able to find peace within any answer. And I left it with tears in my eyes but of joy! What a great experience. I wanted this YES, but I worked for it and I am proud of myself, for getting it AND for how I went through it. Why are we so scared to be proud of ourselves? CELEBRATE YOURSELF.  Celebrate your progress. All I want to say with this is try to turn your failures around because they&#39;re only teaching us, work on your self love and DO NOT GIVE UP. Nowadays we managed to made it a hard job to LOVE ourselves but don&#39;t stop working on it. Authenticity is something that will never stop shining. And whoever this reaches, here&#39;s a message for you that I truly believe: you&#39;re incredibly valuable, you have so much to give to yourself and others. Every single one of us. Do not give up. Realize your power. I take this with me forever so Thank You @victoriassecret @10magazine @ed_razek @monica.mitro @johndavidpfeiffer ❤️for the opportunity to go through it again and for the 2 past ones, and being able to learn along the way, and THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!! for the incredible experience that is coming our way! I CAN OFFICIALLY ANNOUNCE THAT I AM WALKING THE VICTORIA&#39;S SECRET FASHION SHOW AGAIN. DON&#39;T KNOW HOW TO EXPRESS HOW GRATEFUL I AM. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️🔐❤️🔐 also big thank you to everyone involved in my progress and life.. you know who you are, I feel incredibly lucky.  Gracias ESPAÑA ❤️🇪🇸❤️🇪🇸❤️</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A post shared by Blanca Padilla (@blaancapadilla) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2017-08-23T16:33:44+00:00">Aug 23, 2017 at 9:33am PDT</time></p></div></blockquote>
<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>
	</div>
</div>


			</div>

	<div class="listicle-slide-dek"></div>
</div>

	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
		
		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Hereith Paul</span>
	</div>

		<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		
	
<div class="slide-media lazyload-in-view listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-embed slide-media-instagram">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
		<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:62.5% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BYJIxMal79B/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">VS FASHION SHOW 2017, here I come! 🙏🏾 It is my pleasure to announce that I will be walking in the Victoria&#39;s Secret Fashion Show for the second time. THANK YOU to @victoriasecret  @edrazek @monica.mitro @johndavidpfeiffer  @10magazine @womenmanagementny, #teamheriethpaul, my family and friends for all your support. I will give my best on the runway and make sure to represent all the girls out there with dreams bigger than themselves. May this announcement bring hope and determination to anyone who reads it.  ISSA SHUTDOWN #VSFS2017 !!</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A post shared by Herieth Paul🇹🇿 (@heriethpaul) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2017-08-23T16:19:29+00:00">Aug 23, 2017 at 9:19am PDT</time></p></div></blockquote>
<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>
	</div>
</div>

				</li>
			
										<li class="seo-tag">
					<a class="seo-link" href="//www.seventeen.com/celebrity/a12108351/gigi-hadid-is-walking-the-victorias-secret-fashion-show-2017/" title="Gigi Hadid Is Walking the 2017 VS Fashion Show">Gigi Hadid Is Walking the 2017 VS Fashion Show</a>
				</li>
							<li class="seo-tag">
					<a class="seo-link" href="//www.seventeen.com/fashion/news/g2933/2016-victorias-secret-fashion-show-models/" title="Models Walking in the 2016 Victoria&#039;s Secret Show">Models Walking in the 2016 Victoria&#039;s Secret Show</a>
				</li>
							<li class="seo-tag">
					<a class="seo-link" href="//www.seventeen.com/fashion/a13797663/kendall-jenner-victoria-secret-fashion-show-2017/" title="Why Kendall Jenner Won&#039;t Be at the 2017 VS Show">Why Kendall Jenner Won&#039;t Be at the 2017 VS Show</a>
				</li>
							<li class="seo-tag">
					<a class="seo-link" href="//www.seventeen.com/fashion/a12102421/bella-hadid-confirmed-victoria-secret-runway-fashion-show-2017/" title="Bella Hadid Will Walk in Victoria&#039;s Secret Show">Bella Hadid Will Walk in Victoria&#039;s Secret Show</a>
				</li>
							<li class="seo-tag">
					<a class="seo-link" href="//www.seventeen.com/fashion/celeb-fashion/a12150982/kendall-jenner-not-in-victorias-secret-fashion-show-2017-la-perla/" title="Why Kendall Jenner Won’t Be Walking the VS Show">Why Kendall Jenner Won’t Be Walking the VS Show</a>
				</li>
							<li class="seo-tag">
					<a class="seo-link" href="//www.seventeen.com/fashion/celeb-fashion/news/a35381/jourdan-dunn-victorias-secret-fashion-show-bs-bullshit/" title="Top Model Jourdan Dunn: Victoria&#039;s Secret Fashion Show Is &quot;BS&quot;">Top Model Jourdan Dunn: Victoria&#039;s Secret Fashion Show Is &quot;BS&quot;</a>
				</li>

						<a class="seo-link" href="/content/victoria-s-secret/">victoria&#039;s secret</a>

	</div>

<script type="text/template" id="autosuggest-link-template">
	<li>
		<a href="<%= data.searchLink %>" class="search-overlay-autosuggest-link" data-type="<%= data.type %>" >
			<%= data.label.replace( data.term, "<span class=\"search-overlay-autosuggest-link-type\" >" + data.term + "</span>" ) %>
		</a>
	</li>
</script>
<script id="recirc-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="recirculation-module" data-tracking-id="recirc-<%= data.feed.feed_type %>" data-tracking-label="More From <%= data.feed.title %>">
		<div class="recirculation-module-header">
			More From

			<a class="recirculation-module-feed-link" href="<%= data.feed.url %>"><%= data.feed.title %></a>
		</div>

		<div class="recirculation-module-inner">
			<% _.each( data.content, function( item ) { %>
				<div class="simple-item recirculation-module-item">
					<div class="recirculation-module-image">
						<% if ( item.image ) { %>
							<a class="full-item-image item-image recirculation-image" href="<%= item.url %>">
								
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view " data-src="<%= item.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof item.image.srcset !== "undefined" && item.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= item.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>


								<%
	var displayTypeTitle = item.displaytype._attributes.title;
	var contentTypeTitle = item.contenttype._attributes.title;

	var contentTypeIcon = {
		"Quizzes": "quiz",
		"Video": "video"
	}[ contentTypeTitle ];

	var displayTypeIcon = {
		"Gallery": "gallery"
	}[ displayTypeTitle ];

	var acceptedContentTypes = contentTypeTitle === "Quizzes" || contentTypeTitle === "Video";
	var acceptedDisplayTypes = displayTypeTitle === "Gallery";

	var showIcons = acceptedContentTypes || acceptedDisplayTypes;
%>

<% if ( showIcons ) { %>
	<div class="content-type-icon">
		<i class="icon icon-<% if ( contentTypeIcon ) { %><%= contentTypeIcon %><% } else { %><%= displayTypeIcon %><% } %>"></i>
	</div>
<% } %>

							</a>
						<% } else { %>
							<a class="recirculation-content-indicator" href="<%= item.url %>">
								<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

							</a>
						<% } %>
					</div>

					<a class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title" href="<%= item.url %>"><%= item.title %></a>

					<% if ( item.sponsor ) { %>
							

<%
	var sponsorClass = {
		"1": "no-logo",
		"2": "sponsored-by",
		"3": "brand-logo",
		"4": "provided-by",
		"5": "created-for",
		"6": "custom-label"
	}[ item.sponsor.type ],
	siteName = item.sitename,
	customLabelLong = item.sponsor.custom_label_long,
	customLabelShort = item.sponsor.custom_label_short;
%>

<% if ( sponsorClass != "no-logo" ) { %>
	<div class="sponsor sponsor-inline simple-item-sponsor recirculation-sponsor <%= sponsorClass %>">
		<div class="sponsor-label">
			<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
					<span class="site-name"><%= siteName %></span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "created-for" ) { %>
				<span class="created-for--short" >
					Created for
				</span>

				<span class="created-for--long" >
					Created by <%= siteName %> for
				</span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "custom-label" ) { %>
				<span class="custom-label--short" >
					<%= customLabelShort %>
				</span>

				<span class="custom-label--long" >
					<%= customLabelLong %>
				</span>
			<% } else { %>
				<% if ( sponsorClass === "sponsored-by" ) { %>
					Presented by
				<% } %>

				<% if ( sponsorClass === "provided-by" ) { %>
					Created by
				<% } %>
			<% } %>
		</div>
		<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
			<span class="sponsor-logo-separator">+ </span>
		<% } %>
		<div class="sponsor-image">
			<%= item.sponsor.brand %>
		</div>
	</div>
<% } %>

					<% } %>
				</div>
			<% } ); %>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>
<script id="eoc-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="end-of-content-header">
		Read Next
	</div>
	<div class="end-of-content-inner">
		<% _.each( data, function( item ) { %>
			<div class="simple-item end-of-content-simple-item" data-tracking-id="recirc-eoc">
				<% if ( item.image ) { %>
					<a class="simple-item-image item-image endofcontent-image" href="<%= item.url %>">
						
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view " data-src="<%= item.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof item.image.srcset !== "undefined" && item.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= item.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>

					</a>
				<% } else { %>
					<a class="recirculation-content-indicator" href="<%= item.url %>">
					<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

					</a>
				<% } %>
				<a class="end-of-content-title item-title" href="<%= item.url %>"><%= item.title %></a>
				<% if ( item.sponsor ) { %>
						

<%
	var sponsorClass = {
		"1": "no-logo",
		"2": "sponsored-by",
		"3": "brand-logo",
		"4": "provided-by",
		"5": "created-for",
		"6": "custom-label"
	}[ item.sponsor.type ],
	siteName = "Seventeen",
	customLabelLong = null,
	customLabelShort = null;
%>

<% if ( sponsorClass != "no-logo" ) { %>
	<div class="sponsor sponsor-inline simple-item-sponsor recirculation-sponsor <%= sponsorClass %>">
		<div class="sponsor-label">
			<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
					<span class="site-name"><%= siteName %></span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "created-for" ) { %>
				<span class="created-for--short" >
					Created for
				</span>

				<span class="created-for--long" >
					Created by <%= siteName %> for
				</span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "custom-label" ) { %>
				<span class="custom-label--short" >
					<%= customLabelShort %>
				</span>

				<span class="custom-label--long" >
					<%= customLabelLong %>
				</span>
			<% } else { %>
				<% if ( sponsorClass === "sponsored-by" ) { %>
					Presented by
				<% } %>

				<% if ( sponsorClass === "provided-by" ) { %>
					Created by
				<% } %>
			<% } %>
		</div>
		<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
			<span class="sponsor-logo-separator">+ </span>
		<% } %>
		<div class="sponsor-image">
			<%= item.sponsor.title %>
		</div>
	</div>
<% } %>

				<% } %>
			</div>
		<% }); %>
	</div>
</script>
<script id="content-testing-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="ct-unit">
		<div class="ct-unit-inner">
			<div class="ct-unit-text-container">
				<a class="ct-unit-heading" href="<%= body.variant_url %>">Read This Next</a>

			</div>

		data-srcset="<%= srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>

			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>

			<script id="deferred-css-script-tag">( function( Modernizr ) {
	var d = document,
	ua = navigator.userAgent,
	reMobile = /Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Kindle|NetFront|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Fennec|Minimo|Opera M(obi|ini)|Blazer|Dolfin|Dolphin|Skyfire|Zune/ig;

	if ( Modernizr && Modernizr.addTest ) {
		Modernizr.addTest( "mobile", function() {
			return reMobile.test( ua ) && Modernizr.mq( "only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)" );
		} );

		Modernizr.addTest( "tablet", function() {
			return reMobile.test( ua ) && !Modernizr.mobile;
		} );
	}

	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/seventeen/assets/css/listicle.4e5dc52.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/seventeen/assets/css/listicle-mobile.961a718.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( Modernizr );
